summary: This document appears to be a business deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, detailing the requirements for establishing a business relationship with the bank. It includes information on customer identification policies, anti-money laundering obligations, and terms and conditions for deposit accounts.
keyFacts: The document outlines the requirements for customer identification to combat terrorism funding and money laundering.
It specifies that financial institutions must verify the identity of individuals establishing accounts.
The document includes terms regarding the use of ATM/Debit cards and Internet Banking Services.
It emphasizes the client's responsibility to fulfill tax obligations related to their business relationship with the bank.
There are references to confidentiality and legal obligations under federal rules.
